epic2.pull_request: PR #149 - Epic 2 - Task 2.5: Implement MHD Parser with TDD

recent_activities.description: Analyzed MidsReborn architecture, created comprehensive integration plan, implemented proper initialization sequence in DataExporter. Created GitHub issues #161-164 for tracking MHD to JSON export implementation.
Implemented complete MHD parser with TDD approach, supporting binary and text formats, JSON export, and CLI interface. Fixed all CI issues and achieved passing tests.
Closed all Epic 1 GitHub issues, marked Epic 1 as fully complete
Implemented comprehensive database schema with SQLAlchemy models, Alembic migrations, and Pydantic schemas. Ready for data import phase.
